{/* HERO SECTION */}

Reliable Flatbed & Specialized Hauling

Moving your freight safely, securely, and on time — across North America.

{/* INTRO SECTION */}

Flatbed Hauling You Can Trust

At RGM Trucking, we specialize in flatbed and specialized freight solutions. Our experienced drivers, modern equipment, and safety-first culture ensure your cargo arrives exactly as planned.

{/* FEATURES */}

Specialized Equipment

Flatbeds, step decks, and custom solutions designed for oversized and heavy freight.

Safety First

Every load is secured with precision and monitored from pickup to delivery.

Nationwide Coverage

Cross-border and coast-to-coast hauling with dependable scheduling.

{/* DETAILS SECTION */}

Why Choose RGM for Flatbed Shipping?

  • ✔ Experienced flatbed professionals
  • ✔ Real-time communication & updates
  • ✔ C-TPAT, CARB & compliance focused
  • ✔ Family-driven company culture
{/* CTA */}

Let’s Move Your Freight the Right Way

Partner with a carrier that treats your cargo like their own.
